title: Agent-First Tooling and Logging

problem.en: Most developer tools, CLIs, and logs are designed for human consumption with color-coded, multi-line outputs that are difficult for AI agents to parse reliably.
problem.ko: 대부분의 개발자 도구, CLI, 로그는 인간 소비를 위해 설계되어 AI 에이전트가 안정적으로 파싱하기 어려운 컬러 코딩, 다중 라인 출력을 사용합니다.

solution.en: Design tooling and logging to be 'agent-first': unified logging to single source, verbose JSON-structured output, and agent-aware CLI flags (--for-agent).
solution.ko: '에이전트 우선'으로 도구 및 로깅 설계: 단일 소스로 통합 로깅, 상세한 JSON 구조 출력, 에이전트 인식 CLI 플래그(--for-agent).

mermaid_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Agent
    participant CLI as CLI Tool
    participant Logger as Unified Logger
    participant System as System Services

    Agent->>CLI: command --for-agent --json
    CLI->>System: Execute operation
    System->>Logger: Write structured log entry
    Logger->>Agent: JSON log stream
    Note over Agent: Parses structured data easily
code_example:
# Agent-friendly CLI invocation
cli_output = subprocess.run(
    ['myapp', '--for-agent', '--json', 'status'],
    capture_output=True, text=True
)

# Parse structured JSON output
result = json.loads(cli_output.stdout)
# {"status": "healthy", "errors": [], "metrics": {...}}

# Unified logging - single source of truth
# Instead of: client.log, server.log, db.log
# Use: unified.jsonl with all events
